scripts.dev: npm run use:dev && shopify theme dev --store=ml-toys-dev.myshopify.com --theme "Meka – Dev"
scripts.push:dev: npm run use:dev && shopify theme push --store=ml-toys-dev.myshopify.com --unpublished --theme "Meka – Dev"
scripts.push:client:preview: npm run use:client && shopify theme push --store=ml-toys-store.myshopify.com --unpublished --theme "Meka – Preview"
scripts.push:client:meka: npm run use:client && shopify theme push --store=ml-toys-store.myshopify.com --theme 179610845505
